item.title: Fast & Furious 11 Has A Dominic Toretto Problem To Fix Before It Can Bring The Franchise Back To Its Roots
item.description: Fast and Furious 11 will need to fix Dominic Toretto's character problem if it has any hope of bringing back the franchise's street-level stakes.

item.title: Tom Holland's James Bond Pitch From 6 Years Ago Suddenly Has A Second Chance
item.description: Tom Holland had a meeting with Sony where he failed to convince everyone that he had a great James Bond idea, but he might be feeling hopeful now.

item.title: Oscar-Winning Director Isn't Surprised Squid Game & Parasite Gained Global Interest Due To One Specific "Universal Language"
item.description: Mickey 17 director Bong Joon-ho explains the success behind the hit Netflix show Squid Game and his 2019 Oscar-winning feature, Parasite.
